body: Thanks Abraham - a very good example file! The key point for other followers is the Shade Net Effect (check the red arrows) - based on the calculation of Heating/Cooling Degree Days! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/7466U3ZMMqXKMK9*3lLOUeeE0C*aCPfJEjT-fGdoMEu9CyCHxv87Y8S1qhaKyfHyS7*64UvIRa-IwPt51t1ZZAk*zvzX-OWg/Ladybug_ShadeBenefit02.JPG)
